page.title: 11GARDENS
page.content: In the area studied, most of the gardens, especially the smaller ones. were ornamental. However, nearly all incorporated small sections for practical purposes. Some were entirely utilitarian. this might be due to the inhabitants earning a low wage and they need to supplement their income. many of the landowners grow all their own fruit and vegetables. All the gardens seem to produce a good yield of crops. The vegetables included potatoes , carrots, runner beans, and sprouts. The fruits included both cooking and eating apples, raspberries, blackcurrants, blackberries, and strawberries. Some gardeners cultivated herbs, the most popular being mint. On the whole the gardens were well-used and well-kept.
